summary: Initializes and wraps the GEOS C library for Django GIS using ctypes, defines pointer structures, registers error and notice callbacks, and provides a lazy-loading factory for GEOS functions along with helper utilities for pointer arrays and version information.
business_intent: Allow Djangoâ€™s geographic features to interact with the GEOS geometry engine efficiently and safely, handling library loading, error reporting, and function access without incurring unnecessary overhead.
